attributes.action: Make street cabinets cooler, so they don't over heat and cause internet issues.
attributes.additional_details: I spoke to a BT Engineer he told me this is the problem.
attributes.background: A lot of people who are into online games are getting a lot of connectivity issues this summer. I want to help prevent this for the next big heat wave we get.  This is because the street cabinets are not designed to be exposed to heat waves.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
